CPT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 10 Apprentice Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 31, 2025, 15:08 IST
 Cochin Port Trust
 10 Jobs |  Posted On : 31-Jul-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 9,000 to 9,000




FOLLOW

Cochin Port Trust (CPT) has launched the official notification for 2025 for the position of Apprentice jobs for the 10 vacancies. Cochin Port Trust Recruitment 2025 is looking for candidates who have qualified in the B.Com, BBA, and B.Sc can apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Kerala.

CPT Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Apprentice 	10	B.Com, BBA, B.Sc

Age limit for the CPT Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years
The Maximum Age Limit: 24 years

Selection Process for the CPT Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CPT Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 9,000 /-per month.

Application fee for the CPT Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CPT Recruitment 2025
Visitthe official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career page.
Check for the Apprentice Notification 2025.
Read the Notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Log in with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload your scanned documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	30-07-2025
Last Date of Application	12-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
